title: New pet owners can get everything they need in one place with this ingenious Amazon service
text:
The Insider Picks team writes about stuff we think you'll like. Business Insider has affiliate partnerships, so we get a share of the revenue from your purchase.

Getting a new pet is exciting, but it is also a little stressful. You’re adding a new member to your family, and you want to make sure your kitten or puppy feels warm and safe when they finally arrive at their new home.

Prospective pet owners who want to be prepared for adoption day should take advantage of Amazon’s Beginner Pet Bundle. It's a great service that can help you cover all of your bases.

The bundle's landing page serves as a checklist, suggesting highly-rated products available on Amazon in a number of essential categories, including beds, collars and leashes, food, grooming tools, kennels, and of course plenty of toys. The page is curated to show you products that others have already tried and enjoyed, so you can trust you're getting great recommendations.

In my experience, the first trip to a physical pet store is a little overwhelming. I had no idea how much things were supposed to cost, and couldn't sort out the necessities from luxuries. I ended up spending a lot more money than I was prepared to and buying many items that didn't end up being appropriate for my puppy.

I'm speaking as a dog owner, but Amazon’s Beginner Pet Bundle has curated lists for most pets, so you can still use the service to help prepare for your new kitten, bird, or fish.

I can see Amazon’s Beginner Pet Bundle helping new pet owners avoid unnecessary stress and focus on enjoying the first few days with their new pet. It’s a simple, one-stop shop that covers all the basics and will help you cut down on overspending; it even keeps track of your total as you add items to your cart.
description: Getting a new pet is exciting, but it is also a little stressful. Amazon is taking the guesswork out of shopping for one.
